name: feeNQT
description:
The fee for this transaction expressed in Planck, i.e. 0.01 Signa = 0.01 * 10E8 Planck = 1000000 Planck - The fee depends on the transaction type, but minimum fee is 0.01 Signa
Read more about the fees [here](https://github.com/signum-network/SIPs/blob/master/SIP/sip-34.md)
